author: rhuijben
msg: Small fix to info Relax NG schema to match current behavior.
(entry): Add missing optional conflict child element here.
(wc-info): Remove incorrectly placed conflict element here.
Originally part of r28767 on the tree-conflicts branch.

be joined back together when they merely serve as regression tests.
